title: Simulation-Based Clustering Strategies for Improving Wireless Sensor Network Stability

context.prior_knowledge: Networking fundamentals, data communication principles, and basic simulation tool usage
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused training for IoT system managers/leaders in enterprises, utilizing smartphone-based simulation tools in limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of clustering on energy efficiency and network stability in Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs).
Learners can determine optimal cluster sizes through simulations applying a hybrid strategy of SOM and K-means clustering.
Evaluate and improve routing algorithms for minimizing energy consumption and ensuring stable network operations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
